#noSolutions: Warning: No possible solutions with this combination
BAN-streDesc: Will only target one person at a time
BAN-weakDesc: It fear the Crucifix and will be less aggressive when near one
CAU-streDesc: Increased chance to attack in the dark
CAU-weakDesc: Turning lights on arround the Mare will lower its chance to attack
DEM-weakDesc: Asking a Demon successful questions on the Ouija Board won't lower the user sanity
ESP-weakDesc: Smudge sticks stop it attacking for a long period of time
FAN-streDesc: Looking at it will considerably drop your sanity
FAN-weakDesc: Taking a photo of it will make it temporarily disappear
JIN-streDesc: Travel at a faster speed if its victim is far away

OMB-weakDesc: It will not enter hunting mode if there is multiple people nearby

ONI-weakDesc: Being more active will make the Oni easier to find and identify

REV-streDesc: Travel at a significantly faster speed when hunting a victim
REV-weakDesc: Hiding from the Revenant will cause it to move very slowly
SPE-streDesc: Almost never touche the ground (no footsteps)
YUR-streDesc: Have a stronger effect on people sanity
